mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memail, mpassword, mnickname, mphonenum, mintro, mmyimage, mrole, menabled, murl) VALUES (#{memail},#{mpassword},#{mnickname},#{mphonenum},#{mintro},#{mmyimage},#{mrole},#{menabled},#{murl})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mnickname=#{mnickname}, mintro=#{mintro} WHERE memail=#{memail}
UPDATE member SET mmyimage=#{mmyimage} WHERE memail=#{memail}
